document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">peculiar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">light </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">keep </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">ray </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">clarify </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Sight </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">seek </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Of their peculiar light
